headline: We are the World
description: The Megacities are satellite image collages made up from the biggest cities of one country
tageline: From outer space, the earth looks like one globe, without countries and borders
satellite: As we get closer, the satellite image is where we are first able to see some of the differences of our countries, but we see the similarities of human life in out cities
endline: The Megacity project shows out world from this percpective.
